verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I release my inhibitions, I release my pre-conditions I release myself for what You want to do. I lay down my cares and burdens All that’s fearful and uncertain, I release, I release it to You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I release my gloom and sadness, I release my hate and madness, I release myself for what You want to do I lay down my pride and passions, All the pain and life’s infractions, I release, I release it to You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ooh, sing glory, glory hallelujah to You, Jesus, For all the freedom You bring. La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, I release, I release it to You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I release faithless religion I release godless tradition I release myself for what You want to do. I lay down my life for You, Lord, All I am and all I live for, I release, I release it to You.{/lang-eng}
